A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: JJ set up so much for Rian to accomplish\, and he just threw most of it away. Probably the most eventful and action packed Star Wars film\, so it makes a bit of ground up there for me. Biggest disappointment is that it took Luke almost the entirety of a film to learn to become a Jedi and Rey learns to become one in 3 minutes. Also\, the Finn and Rose arc didn’t need to happen at all\, and felt just forced upon us. Overall\, I see it as better then the Prequels\, but worse then the originals and Force Awakens by a decent margin
